goal.ch: This course aims to train students to utilize the skills and tools acquired from the Chemical and Materials Engineering Department. Students will learn to integrate various processes, such as reaction, separation, and heat exchange, collect data, and perform energy and mass balance calculations. They will gain the knowledge needed to design processes that optimize energy and material efficiency using simulation tools. Additionally, students will work on the Process Design Competition problem organized by the Taiwan Institute of Chemical Engineers.
